title: Are you as how your soul is? How different is your outer being compared to your soul? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think all my life I would never know how to perfectly describe how my soul is. On the inside, I am an adventurous young lady, I am pretty wise compared to my friends. I think about how the universe works sometimes and I have a bunch of weird questions/things in my mind that I wish I had somebody to tell without them thinking I’m crazy. On the outside, my freedom is limited. I wanted to travel and try new things but due to financial problems and strict parents I can barely step out of my city. Sometimes my friends would say something to me that makes the situation really awkward and I would reply them things that are not me. I don’t want to change how I present myself just to please them. I wanna be able to tell them that they are wrong and they should do the right thing even though it is not about me (ex: racism, body shaming, making fun of others, etc…). I am nowhere near who I actually am on the inside but I’m trying. I just need lots of courage.

The word soul is a roman word. The greek translation of the word soul is psyche. Psyche is a greek goddess, her husband is Eros. Eros translates into the roman word Cupid. Cupid and Soul or Eros and Psyche. Psyche was a human girl. Earthlings called her Venus because she was pretty, they worshiped her. Venus got mad and sent cupid to get her. Cupid fell in love with her and married her. Venus got mad at both of them and said they couldnt be together unless Psyche became a goddess too. The only way to become devine is to go to hell and back. She did. And then soul became real. There is only one soul it is her. She loves him. Even enough to go to hell for him. He loves her enough to quit life in heaven to be with her. When she went to hell he went with her. Read the myth of Eros and Psyche. Its my favorite story. We have no soul on our own it is something bigger than we are. The soul chases love and love chases the soul. Love and Soul are alive and have a mind of their own. People had this religion for thousands of years, who are we to disagree.

Concerning soul and heart people often See me better than who I realy am and I am not sure if I have role in this.. I wish I don't About mind ..I think I ’m more clever and efficient than some people think! And somehow I always help them in that. One of my goals now is how To be more faithful with mySelf and people so that people can see my reality with its both sides.

Everyone is different. It depend how well you know your self and how much you listen to your deep inner feeling, are you in a conflict with you self or not. Between your outer and inner being there is a space where all the misunderstandings happens. That’s why they say “You measure 3 time before you cut.”

A soul is a concept. It’s like me asking you if are how your aura is. Or asking if you’re like your spirit animal. Or what you would look like as a Martian. The soul is a notion, an idea an artistic interpretation of an unknown. There is no answer to a concept.
You do not have a soul. You are a soul. All of you is your soul inside and out. Top to bottom. So, yes, you are as your soul is. Your soul is as you are.
My soul wants to just go run and have an adventure around the world My outer being is trying to figure that out while having family and social responsibilities
Well, I exist. Haven’t seen any sign of anything best described as a “soul.” I think existence is a pretty significant difference.
Your soul is a pointer to the thing that is bigger than the universe, and it is inside you.
